original_title: Technology Faculty of Ruhuna University closed for a week
original_body_lines: The Faculty of Technology of the Ruhuna University will be closed for one week from today following an assault on the Sub-Warden, his wife and mother by a group of students yesterday (Feb. 26).
Accordingly, the Vice Chancellor (VC) of the University of Ruhuna said that the students have also been ordered to vacate the university premises by 2.00 p.m. today (Feb. 27).
